incidents.name: Our Engineers are Investigating an Issue with API

incident_updates.body: Our engineers are currently investigating the customer impact of a retroactive issue with API timeouts. We will follow up and provide customer impact details within 2 hours.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Megafon Network in Tajikistan

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Megafon network in Tajikistan. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Megafon network in Tajikistan. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Trial Account Currency Updates Are Resulting in Some Accounts Suspensions

incident_updates.body:
We continue to experience the issue where trial account currency updates are resulting in some accounts being suspended.
Our engineering team is investigating the issue, and we expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Megafon and Yota

incident_updates.body: The Megafon and Yota networks in Russia are conducting a planned maintenance from 28 November 2023 at 12:00 PST until 28 November 2023 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Megafon and Yota Russia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Vodafone

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Vodafone UK is conducting an emergency maintenance from 28 November 2023 at 15:00 PST until 28 November 2023 at 21:55 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Vodafone UK customers.
Impacted Products: Lookup Identity Match, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Motiv

incident_updates.body: The Motiv network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 28 November 2023 at 15:00 PST until 28 November 2023 at 17:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Motiv Russia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Portugal Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in Portugal is conducting an emergency maintenance from 28 November 2023 at 17:00 PST until 28 November 2023 at 17:05 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be call failures to a subset of Twilio Portugal phone numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS Carrier Maintenance - Small US Carriers

incident_updates.body: A subset of small US networks in the US are conducting a planned maintenance from 28 November 2023 at 21:00 PST until 29 November 2023 at 01:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from small US carriers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - K-Telecom and KTK Telecom

During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to K-Telecom and KTK Telecom Russia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: France Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

scheduled_maintenances.name: France and Germany Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in France and Germany is conducting a planned maintenance from 06 December 2023 at 13:00 PST until 06 December 2023 at 19:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects and call failures for calls from and to Twilio France and Germany phone numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Canada Account Security Service Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our service partner is conducting a panned maintenance from 06 December 2023 at 21:00 PST until 06 December 2023 at 23:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for the following carrier and country: Telus and Koodo networks in Canada

Impacted Products:
Lookup SIM Swap
Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

scheduled_maintenances.name: Planned Maintenance for Flex Insights Historical Reporting

incident_updates.body: The Flex Insights Historical Reporting dashboards visualisation partner in the US is conducting a planned maintenance on Saturday, December 9th, 2023, at 1:00 AM Pacific Standard Time. The maintenance window is planned to take up to 3 hours. During the maintenance window, Flex Insights Historical Reporting access will be unavailable.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Twilio's Messaging Services Feature is Undergoing a Routine Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Were conducting a planned maintenance in all countries between 11:00 PM and 12:00 AM Pacific Time on 12/14/2023. During the maintenance window, customers will see high latency and possible 5xx errors while trying to add/remove senders from a Messaging Service.

There will be no impact on any of the messages being sent via a messaging service.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US and Canada SMS and MMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Toll-Free, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Toll-Free, North America

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Our SMS and MMS carrier partner in the US and Canada is conducting a series of planned maintenance from 01 November 2023 at 20:00 PDT until 30 November 2023 at 00:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and MMS to and from US and Canada handsets via Toll-free numbers.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

01 November 2023 at 20:00 PDT until 02 November 2023 at 00:00 PDT
08 November 2023 at 20:00 PST until 09 November 2023 at 00:00 PST
15 November 2023 at 20:00 PST until 16 November 2023 at 00:00 PST
29 November 2023 at 20:00 PST until 30 November 2023 at 00:00 PST

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Toll-Free, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Toll-Free, North America
